content.title: Safai Karmakaar Ke Putr/Putri Hetu Vishesh Coaching Yojana
content.details: Labor Department of Chhattisgarh State started this scheme 'Safai Karmakaar Ke Putr/Putri Hetu Vishesh Coaching Yojana' for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015. The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for free coaching.
benefits: The fee for special coaching for admission in engineering, medical, CA and MBA or other professional education to the son/daughter (two children) studying in class 10th and above will be paid by the board.
eligibility: Children of registered sanitation workers will qualify for benefits.

If a student is eligible for assistance from multiple government departments or institutions, they may choose the program that is most beneficial to them, but they cannot receive benefits from two programs simultaneously.
documents_required: Mark certificate of previous year exam

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme 'Safai Karmakaar Ke Putr/Putri Hetu Vishesh Coaching Yojana' for unorganized worker on 28 April 2012.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The main objective of the scheme to provide financial assistance for free coaching.

faqs.question: What are the benefits?
faqs.answer: Financial assistance will be provided for free coaching.

faqs.question: Who can get the benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible registered unorganized labor individuals from Chhattisgarh State.

faqs.question: How many children of a parent will be eligible for the benefits?
faqs.answer: Only 2 sons/daughters of registered sanitation workers are eligible for the scholarship.

faqs.question: Can applicant get the benefits of parallel scheme from the state government?
faqs.answer: Applicant must not be receiving any other parallel scheme of the state government.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must be registered under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Only then can the applicant apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: How can applicant register under Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Enter the following details, Select Group Name: 'Asangathit Marmakaar Mandal', Select Service: 'Asangathit Shramik Panjikaran', What do you want to do: 'Aavedan', Click next. Check the eligibility criteria for registration in Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board and click next. Fill out the online 'Registration form'. Submit.

faqs.question: How to apply for the scheme?
faqs.answer: All the applicant have to visit the official website Chhattisgarh Labour Department. On the home page click on 'Apply' under 'Chhattisgarh Unorganized Workers State Social Security Board'. Provide the required details. Fill out the application form. Submit.
